column14: Please do not buy this dash cam, itâ€™s a waste of money. I installed this dash cam in January/ February of 2020. Apparently, the dash cam stopped recording from November 2020 until the end of September of 2021!!!!! The only reason why it started recording again is because I was playing around with the dash cam, while I was waiting in the car one day.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
column14: Very nice dual camera. I had an older single camera version I sold with my car. This one is bigger, of course, but I much prefer the way it mounts to the windshield compared to other camera brands. This one has the super capacitor in place of the battery - much more reliable. It is a bit tricky to do a good job of running the wire back to the rear camera. No fault of this product - just the way it is. If you are not comfortable working with interior trim and want it to come out looking good, I suggest you watch some YouTube videos or have a professional do the install.
